mapper.select: SELECT form_code AS code, form_name AS formName, default_form AS defaultForm, main_form AS mainForm, form_used_status AS status FROM form WHERE form_code=#{code};

SELECT t1.category, t1.use_id as useId, CASE WHEN t1.category = 'C' THEN t2.comp_name WHEN t1.category = 'E' THEN t3.est_name WHEN t1.category = 'D' THEN t4.dept_name WHEN t1.category = 'U' THEN t5.user_name END AS name FROM (Select * FROM form_use_department WHERE form_code=#{code}) t1 LEFT JOIN company t2 ON t1.use_id = t2.comp_id LEFT JOIN establishment t3 ON t1.use_id = t3.est_id LEFT JOIN department t4 ON t1.use_id = t4.dept_id LEFT JOIN user t5 ON t1.use_id = t5.user_id;

select distinct t1.form_code, form_name, form_explain from form t1 left join form_use_department t2 on t1.form_code = t2.form_code where ((t2. category = 'U' and use_id = #{userId}) or (t2.category = 'D' and use_id = #{deptId}) or (t2.category = 'E' and use_id = #{estId}) or (t2.category = 'C' and use_id =#{compId})) and t1.form_used_status = 1 and t1.form_del_status = 0;

select distinct t1.seq_code, seq_name as name from sequence t1 left join sequence_use_form t2 on t1.seq_code = t2.seq_code left join sequence_use_department t3 on t3.seq_code = t2.seq_code where form_code =#{formCode} and ((t3. status = 'U' and use_id = #{belong.userId}) or (t3.status = 'D' and use_id = #{belong.deptId}) or (t3.status = 'E' and use_id = #{belong.estId}) or (t3.status = 'C' and use_id =#{belong.compId}));
select form_list_code, form_list_name, form_list_tag from form_list
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO form(comp_id, form_name, default_form, main_form, form_used_status) VALUES(#{compId}, #{formName}, #{defaultForm}, #{mainForm}, #{status});
INSERT INTO form_use_department(category, form_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{formCode}, #{useId});
mapper.delete: delete from form_use_department where category=#{category} and form_code = #{formCode} and use_id = #{useId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO form_use_department(category, form_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{formCode}, #{useId});
mapper.update: UPDATE form SET form_del_status=1 WHERE form_code = #{code}
mapper.select: select form_code AS id, form_name from form;

SELECT c.comp_id, c.comp_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, u.user_id, u.user_name, line_order FROM default_approval_line AS dl INNER JOIN company AS c ON dl.comp_id=c.comp_id INNER JOIN department AS d ON dl.dept_id=d.dept_id INNER JOIN user AS u ON dl.user_id=u.user_id WHERE form_code=#{code} ORDER BY line_order;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM default_approval_line WHERE form_code=#{formCode} AND user_id = #{userId} AND dept_id = #{deptId} AND comp_id=#{compId}
